nodes.text: Ben Blacker is an author. Along with Ben Acker, Blacker is writing the books in the Join the Resistance series of young readers focusing on a group of young Resistance members in the years after Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. Blacker also created with Acker the program Thrilling Adventure Hour.
Blacker along with Acker contributed to the compilation volume From a Certain Point of View.
